resources.string: You can rewatch anytime via the settings page.
You will be redirected to the intro screen.

Exoplanet data: https://exoplanetarchive.ipac.caltech.edu/docs/program_interfaces.html 

 Planet 3D model: At https://poly.google.com/view/9OPocAqXM0u by Google licensed under CC-BY 

 Space-time warp gif: https://thumbs.gfycat.com/DigitalUnfinishedCatfish-size_restricted.gif 

 SPIRIT logo font: https://www.dafont.com/viking.font 

 Solid rocket motor image: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ammonium_perchlorate_composite_propellant#/media/File:Rocket.jpg 

 Liquid rocket image: https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-822ebc17683369810c2a9f91f850f284 

 Cryogenic rocket image: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cryogenic_rocket_engine#/media/File:Moteur-Vulcain.jpg 

 Antimatter rocket: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antimatter_rocket#/media/File:Antimatter_Rocket.jpg 

 Solar sail image: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solar_sail#/media/File:IKAROS_solar_sail.jpg 

 https://www.nasa.gov/sites/default/files/thumbnails/image/photo_4_ntp_outward_bound.jpg 

 Intro video images: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/History_of_rockets#/media/File:Oldest_depiction_of_rocket_arrows.jpg, https://www.sciencelearn.org.nz/resources/1868-brief-history-of-rockets-timeline, https://www.nasa.gov/missions/research/f_goddard.html, https://www.nasa.gov/multimedia/imagegallery/image_feature_924.html, https://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/apollo/apollo11.html, https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Salyut_1#/media/File:Salyut_1.jpg, https://www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/hubble/story/index.html 

 Tesla image: https://www.inverse.com/article/41025-space-x-tesla-spaceman-asimov-foundation-arch-books-falcon
You will be notified when you enter the destination planet\'s orbit
